member.name: M:Orion.API.Extensions.QueryableExtensions.WhereBuilder``2(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0},Orion.API.Models.WhereParams{``1})
member.summary:
query = query.WhereBuilder(param)
.Mapping(x => x.InvoicePrefix, y => y.InvoicePrefix)
.Mapping(x => x.Sum, y => y.Total)
.Mapping(x => x.ProductQty, y => y.InvoiceIssueItems.Select(z => (int?)z.Qty))
.Build();
